website_summaries.verdict: If you're looking for a lightweight case that offers lots of different design options, this is an ideal choice.
pros: A sturdy case that can also be used as a stand
The cover includes a magnetic closure that works with your iPad's sleep and wake feature
Available in a wide variety of colors and patterns while still offering decent protection from bumps and drops
cons: Does add a little bulk to the iPad and doesn't offer as much protection as some other cases

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This cover is not what I expected for the price. It is very well made. I knew it had a pocket or at least I thought it did.After receiving it I went back to check the description and yes it did. Blended in so well I missed it. Everyone that has seen it has commented on how nice it is. I consider this a great bargain.
customer_reviews.author: Shoregirl

customer_reviews.title: I ordered the navy and it looks nice. There is a handy pocket on the front ...
customer_reviews.text: Fintie cover fit the new 2017 Ipad perfectly. I ordered the navy and it looks nice. There is a handy pocket on the front for a small amount of paperwork and a loop for the stylus. It will stand up with the adjustable back for easier viewing. This is a great product.
customer_reviews.author: BL

customer_reviews.title: New 2017 iPad Case
customer_reviews.text: BB didn't have any cases for the new 2017 iPad, not sure why since others did. This case was delivered in a timely manner and the fit was excellent. Looks like it will protect the corners, which some cases apparently do not. So far, seems to work as advertised. I am very happy with the product and recommend it for the new 2017 iPad.
customer_reviews.author: Barry C

customer_reviews.title: The packaging was great. All in all
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the Fintie iPad 9.7 in BLUE and BLACK. The packaging was great. All in all, I was not expecting such strong iPad cases. But these proved to be the strongest for such a great price. These cases are above expectations. They are sewn beautifully. The iPads has fallen from great heights and survived. They fit the iPad well and it does not stretch out. The iPad cases have even prevented a messy situation with some spills. I HIGHLY recommend these cases.
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Great case
customer_reviews.text: This case is great. Pretty thick and sturdy, but still lightweight. I just bought the new IPad 2017 and it fits perfectly. A little tricky to get in at first, but then it stays snugly in place. IPad velcros in so it won't fall out. It stays up perfectly while I'm on FaceTime because the 3 different setting spots for holding it up are thick and raised, not little grooves like my old case had. It also has the sleep/wake feature, so the screen shuts off when you close the case. The design is sharp and true to the picture. I love it. I'm glad I chose this one, and I really can't foresee any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Ally

customer_reviews.title: Nice-looking Case
customer_reviews.text: I really like this iPad case. The rose gold has a small shimmer to it. I like that the case protects the outer corners of my iPad and the cover is magnetic to keep the cover closed. I am hoping that it will last me awhile and that the case doesn't start cracking or show signs of wear fast. I've used it for almost a two weeks, and I am satisified with it.
customer_reviews.author: S. Richey

customer_reviews.title: Fits 9.5 iPad, and I highly recommended it.
customer_reviews.text: First of all, this fits an iPad 9.5, seems like good construction, and it is a perfect fit. I like the stand and three different angles. But one thing it didn’t mention is when you close it, your iPad will go to sleep, so that’s an awesome battery saver. I highly recommend this, I have had it one day and I can tell it is good quality, and should last for a long time. If there is anything bad to say, maybe they could come up with more pictures, seems to be limited. But I love it and highly recommend it for the price is really good.
customer_reviews.author: Bull PT Gear

customer_reviews.title: A+ so far !!!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good , I ordered the galaxy print case...picture on case is very nice and just as shown online...as far as the design goes it's ten times better than the other finite case with the 360° rotation with the deep groves in it....that one was useless...this case does NOT SAG ON ANY ANGLE U PLACE YOUR IPAD....THIS DESIGN IS SOOOO MUCH BETTER...now as for quality it's very thick and looks like real leather and its also seems pretty study which is an A+ ...
customer_reviews.author: patricia

customer_reviews.title: Durable, beautiful and most importantly IT ACTUALLY PROTECTS!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in 2018. It is now 2020 and the cover still looks good as new, with some extremely minimal wear. I love this cover, it secures your ipad that it doesn't slip off, the night mode works wonderfully, and I LOVE the stand feature, especially for drawing. It is a durable hard type cover, it withstands stickers placed on it, and it comfy to carry. I would definitely buy another cover when mine starts to show age. 2018-2020 and its still going strong! The only thing I don't like its the pen holder, but that's actually from personal preference. I'm picky with that but I still use it.
customer_reviews.author: christine

customer_reviews.title: Good iPad Case at a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: I looked at all the cases and reviews, and went with the Fintie again. My previous cases have lasted about 2 years before they started to show wear and some loose threads around the edges. This marble-style case seems like it will last a bit longer. I like the multi-position stand on the last one, and this one seems about as good with a 3 position held by strips instead of indents. Nice looking and feeling, and seems like it will be more protective in a fall than my others.
customer_reviews.author: G. Harris

customer_reviews.title: Nice iPad case that protects very well
customer_reviews.text: Nice iPad case that protects very well. The iPad is inside the exterior dimensions of the case so the corners are well protected from a fall. The 3 position stand rests are in perfect positions. The case is of course a bit heavier than a plain shell case and is thicker but doesn't impede use at all. We ordered a second one for my wife! Appears to be very well constructed.
customer_reviews.author: Mike P

customer_reviews.title: The Positive Reviews are True, Here is Why...
customer_reviews.text: After reading all the positive reviews i was a little skeptical but the case is surprising good quality for the price. I dont use the pocket in the front but its nice to have and i love the stand feature which is great for me when im playing games like Hearthstone. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Has held up and so convenient
customer_reviews.text: I love this, have been using almost two years now, every day. It’s a little bit tattered at the very top because I pick up my iPad from the top most the time, and that’s unfair to the narrow piece of fabric at that location, but it’s still extremely sturdy and works perfectly, holding my iPad in position at the angle I choose. I bought one of these six months later for my bf for his iPad, and he loves it too. We’re both very happy, makes ipadding, as we call it, a joy every morning.
customer_reviews.author: Marie K.

customer_reviews.title: Great iPad case!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter just got the newest iPad, and wanted a nice case to go with it. She was particularly looking for a case that wasn't just a top cover, but folds all the way around the iPad for better protection. She searched many different options, and decided on the Fintie. When she got this case, she was thrilled. The color is a very nice pink. And the stand component works great. We are very, very pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Ames

customer_reviews.title: Very poor quality. Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: I was initially happy with this case until I looked closer. The quality is terrible. The stitching is uneven and after only using it for one month, one of the corners is torn. I am very unhappy that it is already falling apart. I’ve barely even used it!
customer_reviews.author: Puppy Mama

customer_reviews.title: Two major flaws
customer_reviews.text: I liked the case overall, at first. Price was good. I like the way it functions as a stand. It seems sturdy and looks nice. But over time I found there are two problems that I can't get past. First, it doesn't turn off the display when it closes so my battery is always running down. I know there are ways to mitigate that but I just want the case to handle it for me. Secondly, it messes with the compass. I have an app I use frequently that requires compass functionality and I have to take it out of the case to get the compass to work properly. So I'm shopping now for something else.
customer_reviews.author: jillofspeed

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised. Not built to last forever, but for $17.00 it will probably give me a good year of service.
customer_reviews.text: Just had this for a day, but so far it functions well and fits the 5th Gen (2017) iPad perfectly. At first I thought it did not have the auto on/off magnéticos for the iPad, but found out it was my mistake. There is a switch in the iPad settings that let’s one turn the cover on/off function on or off and mine was turned off. As soon as I turned it on the cover functioned as advertised. I would have like something thinner, but I am currently out of the US and all of the thinner covers had at least 10% bad reviews and were more expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Mathematics

customer_reviews.title: Well engineered
customer_reviews.text: The purple is really dark purple which is exactly what I wanted (it looked more magenta on my screen). Despite my reservations about color, I was willing to take a chance because I’d had an excellent similar one in the past (brand forgotten), but it had become quite worn from constant use. This one is even better than my previous cover. The edges are protective, the slots for function access are well placed, and it is professional looking if that’s a concern for you. The slip pocket on the front is a nice option. Definitely top rating.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Incredible Case
customer_reviews.text: I hated my old case for my iPad Air2....it basically had three tiny slits at the bottom but they were not deep and the iPad constantly slipped out of them. Very annoying while sitting and typing. I found this and loved the color and also loved the three bars on the bottom to hold theiPad in place. I just got it today and I can’t believe the difference. Wish I had gotten it a lot sooner. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Wiltshire

customer_reviews.title: It'll do.. but
customer_reviews.text: I love the covers design. It fits snug but the speaker cutouts are off, covering part of the speakers - seems to be a quality control issue. Where the volume is the cutouts are a little off, too. I do have a listed compatible iPad so it's not my iPad. It does seem well made but the feel of the cover material is very slippery feeling, so extra caution to not drop it. The issues are not bad enough to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Great product, but doesn’t rotate.
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to give this iPad cover5 stars, but I had to return it for the following reasons: -while the cover seems really durable, the material used is rough to the touch and stiff -the cover doesn’t rotate. This is my fault because I didn’t check for that feature when ordering. I have had several Fintie cases in the past and have never been disappointed. I simply replaced this one with a different Fintie cover that does rotate. For the price, I think they have some of the best covers out there and I find no reason to change companies. Thank you, Fintie for a great product!
customer_reviews.author: NANCY J

customer_reviews.title: Falling apart
customer_reviews.text: This is an update of my first review. I purchased the flowered one in June 2018. The cover never shut off and woke up my iPad as it was supposed to but I liked the way it propped up my iPad even though it was a little heavy. But now the cover is cracked and tearing along where it folds. The flowers are faded and the pattern is rubbing off. It looks really junky. I’m going to have to replace it. It didn’t even hold up for 9 months. A red one I purchased for my husband looks ok and shuts and wakens his iPad.
customer_reviews.author: wylabird

customer_reviews.title: perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: I got it in the hot pink - more of a pink/purple but still pretty. has a rubble like leather. Also has a pen holder. I have an ipad air 2 and it fits like a glove. At first the sleep mode creeped me out, but I like it. Its almost a magnet that keeps the lid shut. My cat likes to kneed it with his claws and has not torn through it yet. My one complaint is that you have to play with it a bit to have it to the tripod/standup option. I just lean it against something instead of messing with that feature.
customer_reviews.author: a.fig

customer_reviews.title: Quality Feels Cheaper Than in the Past
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time buying this case. I got my first one December 2017 and the blue on the outside started flaking. My iPad wake’s when I open the cover and sleeps when I close. All the buttons and ports are easily accessible; the case is a perfect fit. It’s my second case, so obviously I like it but I knocked it down in stars because it feels thinner/lighter than the one I bought a couple years ago. I’m doubtful I’ll get the same longevity out of this one because of it.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Reads A Lot

customer_reviews.title: No corner protection. Otherwise good case
customer_reviews.text: I’ve loved this case but feel the need to write a review seeing that they say it has ’corner protection’. This case is great except for when my iPad fell in this case and not only did my corner get a little crack but also the sleep/wake button broke and got stuck. My power button no longer functions so I’d say no corner protection
customer_reviews.author: AG

customer_reviews.title: Good design & materials, but...
customer_reviews.text: This is similar to another one I bought a few years ago, and have been very happy with. Very durable materials, and the fit for my IPad was perfect. One odd feature: this item was received with a damaged loop where you would store a stylus. The loop is too small for the styluses I have (same problem with my first one), and this was torn when someone forced the fit. Vendor did not check this, and sent product with the flaw. Since I don't use a stylus much, this is not an issue.
customer_reviews.author: duphphy

customer_reviews.title: Absolutey Best iPad Cover!
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely the BEST cover for the iPad. First, let me start by saying that I knew ZERO about iPad covers when I started this purchase. I searched Amazon and over a thousand people gave this cover a five star rating and I searched no more. I really trust Amazon reviewers and gain a lot of information from the comments that they write. They list things that they like or dislike that are very helpful. So, I bought it and we are absolutely thrilled with the quality and the utility of this cover. I highly recommend it. The only hard part is choosing a color.
customer_reviews.author: John G

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful metallic sheen and padded so it is soft to ...
customer_reviews.text: This case arrived as promised, no delays. Beautiful metallic sheen and padded so it is soft to the touch and not hard like other cases. The case is able to fold over with 3 adjustable groves so you can view the screen comfortably. Price was unbeatable. There is an elastic holder for a stylus if you need to store one. At the back of the case, there is a cutout for the camera. Well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Burke W

customer_reviews.title: Low cost version that doesn't meet expectations
customer_reviews.text: My previous cover was wearing out so I thought I replaced it with the same one, but apparently not. The area for the screen is almost too small and the iPad has to be in "just right" or you can't see the full screen. Also, this one does not rotate - thought it did - my bad. Don't recommend this one.
customer_reviews.author: HappyinWoodinville

customer_reviews.title: Make sure which color your ordering
customer_reviews.text: Works well. There is a little to much matterial on longer sides of the ipad. It can interfere with some of the swiping actions on an Ipad. But it isn’t terrible. The long sides need to have slightly less matterial or be stiffer to be perfect. Over all, I am pleased with it. Solid, easy to put the ipad in the case. I thought I ordered black, but evidently I ordered purple. So be careful what color you order. Although, turns out I like the purple. Update: I have had the cover since Aug. 2018. Cover has met all my expectations. only complaint at this point, March 2020, is the purple is starting to peal around iPad speakers and corners.
customer_reviews.author: Luddite

customer_reviews.title: Nice case, Decent design
customer_reviews.text: So I was so excited about the design on this case I forgot to check if it was a rotating case - it’s not. I use my iPad mostly for reading, having to fold the flap behind the case can feel awkward but it’s not too bad. The case props nicely on the “ledges” for streaming movies. The iPad slides into a “pocket” which is secure but makes it hard to reach button on top of the iPad. I was a tad disappointed that the gold markings weren’t as shimmery or metallic as I had hoped they would be but it’s still a beautiful case that I would recommend if you aren’t looking for a rotating case.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this case! I ended up purchasing it “in the meantime”, while I saved money for a higher end one, but after using it I realized that the quality of it was amazing! I have used it non-stop and take it to school (previous cases scuff up in my backpack) but this one has remained perfect! No scuffs yet, my screen protector is still intact all thanks to this case because I am a clumsy person that drops everything, but this has saved me!
customer_reviews.author: Karla Felix

customer_reviews.title: Ensure You Don't Buy a Ledger the Same Size & Color or.. Surprise!!! When You Go to Use it.
customer_reviews.text: I love this .. but learned the hard way to NOT buy a ledger the same color and size. When I took my daughter to the store and sat in my car to draw on my iPad.. I found out I accidently picked up my ledger for keeping my bills balanced. Yep.. was a very very boring 30 minutes. Both are the same exact color and size - and both have a little loop for a pen. There is a little envelope on the inside, where I store my monitor cleaning cloth.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Jones

customer_reviews.title: Best Case for iPad 2 Air
customer_reviews.text: This replaced another product I had where the back was plastic. After a year the corners were brittle and started breaking off and one side cracked so I had to get another one. This is like the "otter box" for the iPad. Very thick and durable and an excellent fit. The only negative aspect is that this same thickness sometimes makes it difficult to get your fingers to the upper corners. Doesn't block it, but you have to take a little more care to go a little under the outer rim of the cover. It doesn't change my opinion, I would recommend this product if it fits your iPad.
customer_reviews.author: FourBoysMom

customer_reviews.title: Good but ...Velcro catch inside case doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: This item is flawless but for one detail - the Velcro mechanism that is intended to hold the iPad securely in place inside the case itself doesn't grab on to the fabric they chose for the interior - the Velcro closure doesn't work. This results in the iPad device scooting out of position or entirely out of the case at times. It is our hope the case will adjust slightly over time ("break it in" like shoes?), and we may be able to edit the Velcro area without adding too much width to the case - not sure. This item was gifted and was well received by recipient, overall we are pleased w/the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Psahvrin

customer_reviews.title: Nice case
customer_reviews.text: As this is my 1st case (and iPad) I can't compare to other cases. I would have to say initially I'm not sure there is any better 'Folio' style case for the price out there. I only give it 4 stars because it's made of some kind of man made material (PU leather?) and not sure how it will hold up plus I would prefer real leather. As mentioned this is my 1st case for an iPad so I wanted to get something cheap to discover what I liked/wanted in a case before dropping big money on something leather. In the meantime I'll wear this one out first
customer_reviews.author: M. McCoy

customer_reviews.title: The perfect protective shield
customer_reviews.text: I carry my iPad around the house and yard so much now. I thought I didn’t need a case, since I have various propping desks for it, but I didn’t like the scrape of metal against metal on one desk or the vulnerability when I cart it around. This holder is the perfect cushion, but it has a hidden benefit: the flexible back actually drapes over the top of my metal easel desk, hanging the iPad at a better height. Excellent!
customer_reviews.author: A. Peacock

customer_reviews.title: THE AUTO LOCK WORKS....
customer_reviews.text: Just got it, i had a Speck before and auto lock stopped working after 6 months, I had ordered a new Speck case last month, had to return it because the auto lock didn't work from the start and the case was warped, This one is well made, love the texture on the case, and it just shuts, I dont have to fiddle with a lock clasp, The side pocket and pen holder is NICE...too bad the pen holder is small, pen size, forget apple pencils
customer_reviews.author: Riitacat

customer_reviews.title: Love the purple color - better than expected!
customer_reviews.text: At my son's suggestion, I purchased this folio for my iPad (he bought the red one). My iPad goes into sleep mode with no issue. It seems durable but I've only had it for a few weeks - time will tell. Even if I have to replace it in a year, the price point makes it affordable. I love the little elastic holder for a pen - I keep a little pen (with the soft top) which helps me navigate the various items (this is my first iPad so still getting used to it as opposed to an iPhone).
customer_reviews.author: Lula Melisko

customer_reviews.title: Update Heart case lasted 1 month 10 days
customer_reviews.text: I have to update my review. I replaced the case every year which is very unusual for me. The rose gold was very beautiful and protective but seems to crack and peel. I got the heart case this time which doesn’t seem as sturdy. Update heart case lasted 1 month 10 days so I can’t return it. Rose gold is prettier and at least makes it for a year. Maybe it’s the size. They do protect for as long as they last but I’ve had cases that last 7 years for smaller kindles
customer_reviews.author: Pen Pal

customer_reviews.title: Fits IPad Pro 9.7 Very Nicely
customer_reviews.text: This is my fourth cover I have purchased like this over 10 years. Each has held up well and protected the Ipads from minor falls. I purchased one for myself and have given the other three as gifts for close family. I was very happy to see one that fit the newer IPad Pro. The model I received did well in triggering sleep and wake mode, the seams were well molded with no visible weakness or gaping. I have wiped mine down with warm soap and water, but harsher chemicals may cause fading as it can with many poly plastics. Overall I find it very nice for the price range and coverage.
customer_reviews.author: Sawdust Gypsy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: The iPad case fit like a glove. There are holes just were you need them. The buttons are a bit recessed so you do have to make an effort. The cover folds over for viewing a 3 different angles. I got the purple which is a beautiful deep mid purple. I haven't dropped the pad but the cover feels like it would offer decent protection. It does have a leather like feel. The whole ensemble is NOT light weight. It feels like quality and worth the investments. Happy with it and would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Ficus

customer_reviews.title: Great case worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: I just got an ipad 9.7 for an early birthday gift and needed a case for it. This case is a PERFECT fit. The camera eyes are aligned and the ipad fits nice and snug. I love that I have three sort of heights to stand up the “monitor” to. You can also fold back the top cover of the case as well which is a plus. Bonus.. there is a pocket in the front to place cards, money, etc. There is a pen hold up top if you have the attachment for the ipen or just want to place a pen and paper for notes. All in all this is a great case.
customer_reviews.author: Arlene M. SinghTop Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: Solid, attractive and some improvements over past models
customer_reviews.text: Nice solid case. Much like i had with last ipad about 4 years ago and it wore well. Kept ipad safe from falls and i got glass protector to go along with this and it fit in case well. Improvement on this case from last is that the opening for the Home button is now a space and works much much better. The circle hole on the last one didnt match up perfectly so it was harder to press. This is big improvement. All else is same and still works, from the size to the way it stands up. All good. Highly recommend. Shipping was super fast too.
customer_reviews.author: K. Keenan

customer_reviews.title: I love it! I inherited my iPad and case from ...
customer_reviews.text: I love it! I inherited my iPad and case from my husband when he upgraded, but I hated the case. When I propped it, the iPad would fall out of the top 2 clips (all that was holding it in) and slide down. Pushing it back up only hit the power button turning it off. Frustrating! This one has a nice secure Velcro closure so it stays put. I love the pink color I got and would consider getting another one just to suit my whims on various days! Probably lime green!
customer_reviews.author: az mom

customer_reviews.title: Love Love Love
customer_reviews.text: I love this cover! I was using another brand of cover, also inexpensive but good, and it finally died of old age. I ordered another of the exact same kind, and they had changed their product and were now using cheaper materials. Very frustrating. It went into the trash and I went on the hunt for a new cover, where I found the Fintie. This is a great cover - I have the purple and it actually looks and feels like real leather. It stays put to whatever angle I place it and is just a nice quality case, especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara M.

customer_reviews.title: Fits my iPad 6
customer_reviews.text: My last iPad case was from the same maker, so was the first place I looked. They have changed the design, I preferred it without the black frame almost covering the white edge of my iPad, but other than that this case is even sturdier than the old one, which lasted for 6 years! I like to use my iPad in landscape position, and the supports on this case are better and work well. It’s nice looking too.
customer_reviews.author: Bette

customer_reviews.title: Excellent iPad cover!
customer_reviews.text: I love this cover! It's better than any of the others I've had, including those made by Apple. The ridges are perfect for keeping the screen at the angle you want and the cover closes nicely so it goes to sleep (my old one would look closed but that was a lie--the battery would run down and then when I went to use it, I couldn't.) This particular nighttime sky pattern looks very classy, too. If it ever wears out, I'm getting another. ***UPDATE*** Looks good as new after nearly 1 1/2 years! I'm just getting ready to buy a different design for a change of pace.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to replace a boring (but sturdy) black cover I'd had for years. Thought I would go with something more colorful hoping it would be durable. The iPad fits in snuggly and the case appears to be sturdy. I did add an initial sticker (purchased separately on Amazon) to personalize the case. Pleased so far!
customer_reviews.author: Library Gal

customer_reviews.title: Nice, inexpensive, tablet cover.
customer_reviews.text: My new iPad needed a case to protect it, but I didn't want to spend a lot after shelling out so much for the tablet. This case fits the tablet snugly and has all the openings necessary to operate it. It is not leather, but for the price, it is well made. It remains to be seen how long it will last, but for now I am happy with it. The easel feature is nice to have especially when watching a movie.
customer_reviews.author: Ellie Kate

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL QUALITY IPAD COVER
customer_reviews.text: I received this ipad 9.7 cover very quickly from Amazon and was so surprised how much I like it. Great price and fast shipping too! The quality is better than I thought. The stitching is nicely done around the pad, it insulates the ipad nicely against falls, fits perfectly, is very easy to use for stand up or to fold back like a book. The color is so pretty with a slight shimmer effect. I also like the little pocket in the front for storing phone numbers, shopping list, etc. I would highly recommend this cover without hesitation!
customer_reviews.author: V. Cracken

customer_reviews.title: Well made and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased my third iPad cover from this company. Each was for a new iPad. After purchasing the first I knew this was the perfect cover for our needs. I had mine for over a year (and it still looked and performed like new even though it is used every day) before we added a second then third iPad for our business. I cannot recommend this company highly enough. Excellent quality, excellent value, all the features I could ask for.
customer_reviews.author: D. Galineau

customer_reviews.title: Looks fabulous and holds up!
customer_reviews.text: It looks even better in person than I expected. But best of all--it works great at not slipping when I've got it open and propped up on my legs while I'm outside having coffee in the morning. I feel like my (very) old iPad is brand new now. I didn't realize how tacky my old iPad holder looked--and was putting up with it not holding the screen in place like it used to do. I'm really happy with this cover.
customer_reviews.author: Lindalu

customer_reviews.title: Great Case
customer_reviews.text: I really like this case and it’s functionality. When I close the cover, the iPad automatically goes into sleep mode, and the ability to prop my screen at various angles for different uses is great. I have had three different iPads with cases for each, and this is the best case I have ever used. The price was far less than I paid for my other cases but far superior in function. The only drawback to the case is it makes the iPad a bit heavier than I would like. However, in the scheme of things, it is a minor concern.
customer_reviews.author: happyshopper

customer_reviews.title: A really great buy
customer_reviews.text: His iPad case is every thing I expected. The color, purple, is beautiful. The case itself is hard vinyl so it does provide some protection but I haven’t dropped it to test and I don’t plan to. The fit is also great. I have an iPad Air 2, yea I know it’s time for an upgrade but it still works. I’ve gone through a couple of cases and this by far the best one yet, especially for this price.
customer_reviews.author: Janice Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Missing alot
customer_reviews.text: I had a Targus for my iPad that I got off of Amazon and should have bought another. It did a great job of protecting it for many years and was well thought out with quality materials. This is none of those. First it has a flimsy way to secure the iPad in the case. Second the materials aren't 1/2 the quality of the Targus. Third, there's nothing to keep it closed like a strap which the Targus had. So the case opens when pulled from a briefcase so you can scratch the face of the iPad. Price was cheap, so I'll keep as an emergency back up and by a Targus. Really disappointed in it.

customer_reviews.title: I like the simple
customer_reviews.text: This cover fits my iPad perfectly and has the features I wanted. Specifically, I like the simple, but effective way the angle of the display can be adjusted. This design also provides full stability for using the screen keyboard so there is no risk of tipping the iPad over while typing. The materials appear and feel to be a good quality which should provide a long life for the cover while providing good protection for the iPad while being carried around.
customer_reviews.author: C. Tallman

customer_reviews.title: Great cover - great price!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice cover! Quality look of the faux-leather. The fit was exact for the new iPad. Provides excellent protection to the iPad. Great value for the price. Without a doubt I'd order it again if I needed one. You won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Eileen W.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice cover
customer_reviews.text: Love the case. I do wish the front pocket was a little roomier. It really won't be able to hold much since it stays tight against the case. There's no give really. But otherwise love it. Color is just as it appears on the site. It puts my iPad to sleep when the cover is shut. The stand option also works great. And it's very easy to put the iPad in the case. And there's a Velcro flap that keeps it snug in there. No worries of it slipping out. Would definitely buy again. It also arrived when expected.
customer_reviews.author: Waneta

customer_reviews.title: Well Made - Great Price
customer_reviews.text: I originally purchased a Fintie iPad cover for my old iPad 3 and liked it a lot. Its a bit heavy but very durable and is a good protector. I then purchased the new iPad (2018 6th generation) and decided to not purchase the outrageously expensive Apple protector and went for the Finite model that offers a rotatable option. Big mistake. It was simply not designed as well as the other one. I returned it and purchased this one. I like this one a lot. Much like the one I purchased for my iPad 3, it is durable and seems well made. It is likely to last me for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Henry Guinn

customer_reviews.title: This seems like a good case
customer_reviews.text: I like this case - it seems sturdy enough to hold up to moderate wear (going in and out of backpack daily) for a few years. When I first opened it, it had a very strong plastic smell, but that faded after a few days. The added front pocket is nice, but isn't designed to hold much. The elastic loop looks like it will hold a stylus, and that's a nice touch. Overall, I think this was worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Librarian

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Fit for my I Pad Pro 9
customer_reviews.text: The Perfect Fit for my I Pad Pro 9.7..I purchased the Rose Gold...it is the same color as the i pad rose gold with a little sheen(lovely) ..the case is nice and sturdy... There is a little pocket on the front of the case for papers( it lays flat so only something thin can go there or i think it will pull the pocket out of shape and become unsightly) and a black elastic band for the stylus on the side of the case. The inside is gray felt with rose gold. Does not swivel, for my purposes it works wonderfully. The picture does not do justice to this little Gem.
customer_reviews.author: ym

customer_reviews.title: Love this iPad Aircase
customer_reviews.text: This is a really well made iPad case. It is thick, extremely well manufactured and as I researched cases, it has a few features that the other cases didn't have. This case has the pocket on the outside and has three bars to rest and stand up the iPad onto within the inside of the case. Def nice extras! Lots of colors- I purchased the Rose Gold to match my iPad which I love.
customer_reviews.author: L. A. M.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and sturdy iPad cover
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these. One for myself and one for my sister-in-law. We absolutely love them. Beautiful and well made. So much easier to use than what we each had before. Keeps our iPads standing nicely while using with three different positions. I also have a Kindle cover from this brand that I love.
customer_reviews.author: K. Bremer

customer_reviews.title: auto sleep/wake does not work
customer_reviews.text: The magnets are strong enough to keep the case relatively secure when it is closed, but they do not activate the sleep function. Otherwise it seems like a nice enough case, though it is relatively bulky. The extra bulk seems to be an inherent feature of the folio-type cases. Not sure yet if the failure of the sleep function is a deal breaker, but I may be returning this.
customer_reviews.author: M C C

customer_reviews.title: Awesome iPad case, high quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought this case to protect my wife's new iPad 2018 model with the 9.7 inch screen. The fit and finish of the case is very nice. Magnetic closure is strong and holds the case closed even if you shake it around or turn it upside down. This case has 3 built in viewing angles which I have found to be more than sufficient and hold the screen in place well. I recommend this case to anyone looking for a protective iPad case. I bought the heart patterned case since the iPad was an anniversary gift. She loves it, and the pattern looks great on the case. Check out the picture I included.
customer_reviews.author: Stan

customer_reviews.title: Center flop
customer_reviews.text: I tried to like this cover, because it is actually a very nice weight and width. However, the bottom of the iPad is "secured" with a leather flap that has a velcro backing and "attaches" to the back. It doesn't really attach; it just folds under the bottom of the iPad. The issue is that when you open the cover, the leather flap hangs loose. In order to close the cover, one must fold it under the bottom of the ipad. It's annoying, and I worried about the iPad falling out. Also the corners of the case are open, providing no protection in case of an inadvertent fall.
customer_reviews.author: FL12629AZ

customer_reviews.title: Acceptable.
customer_reviews.text: Not the greatest quality or construction, but for the price how can one complain? Main issue it's difficult to grip and hold as it's not engineered with an angled lever to grab. Works well with sitting on a flat surface however and used as desk top. Other issue if that it easily shifts out of place to the left, but can be slipped back into place with little effort so that's just a minor annoyance.
customer_reviews.author: Tia

customer_reviews.title: Cute case, great price
customer_reviews.text: Finite makes cases at great prices. I’ve had 2 of their different model cases for my iPad and I bought this one for my daughter and she loves it. The case protects from normal bumps and slight drops when closed. We always use glass screen protectors and haven’t broken one yet while using this case, so I think it’s doing it’s job. The corners where the case fold to open and close do show some wear after 5 months, but I think that’s to be expected with daily use so I give a full 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Survived flying off a car! And being run over!
customer_reviews.text: In a tragic moment, I left my iPad in this case on the roof my car and drove off. I realized a couple of hours later and retraced my steps. There, on the side of the road, was my iPad. I opened up the case and unbelievably, my iPad was crack-free. I could see the imprint of a tire on the screen so it had clearly been run over, and there was some road rash on the corners, but it was otherwise totally unharmed. Amazing case!
customer_reviews.author: Patty

customer_reviews.title: This case offers great protection. Great value
customer_reviews.text: This product offers great protection. I drop my tablet often and it’s always been ok. When it was time for a replacement due to my extended use, and wear a tear, I tried a different brand and the first time I dropped my tablet my screen cracked. It’s not the best looking or sleek case, but the protection it offers is top notch. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Figueroa

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had it a couple months, I use it at home (no kids use) and don’t pack it in too many bags like for work or anything . It sits up very well, and has 3 notches that do not slip! But It can’t rotate or spin though if you need it for a upwards app. The pen holder on top is great. The sides -the rubbery parts are coming off already, breaking off. It is beautiful design, and for what I paid it’s fine.
customer_reviews.author: Lamb chop

customer_reviews.title: I don't think it will fit the iPad Pro since i believe they are larger. It fits my iPad Air snugly.
customer_reviews.text: It looks exactly as described and feels just like leather. The color is really pretty and it fits perfectly. My iPad is about three years old and the cover I had was really looking tattered. This one fits like a glove, the holes are where they are supposed to be and unlike the ones you purchase in the Apple Store, it has a cover for both the front and back, which is what I wanted for protection of the product. I'm not sure if there is a magnetic strip in it to keep it closed, but it stays closed which I like.
customer_reviews.author: Eno U. Fite

customer_reviews.title: Quality Case!
customer_reviews.text: I just received this in the mail today & can already say that this case is very sturdy, holds a stylus pen, has a small pocket for papers, etc. Absolutely love it & just what I was looking for to replace my broken one! The price can't be beat either....if you're looking for a quality case at an affordable price, don't delay on this one!!!
customer_reviews.author: Nalabud

customer_reviews.title: Fun colors and good case.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second case, I really loved my first case but the edge (binding area) was cracking. My mom had same case but hers is the pleather and she got at same time, it hasn't shown that type of wear yet. I'm thinking mine did because it's a type of hard plastic material perhaps? I obviously love the case or I wouldn't have bought another one, just too bad I didn't get a discount since it is my second one and I'm a returning customer.
customer_reviews.author: Holly S Alvarado

customer_reviews.title: It’s a Winner!
customer_reviews.text: Second one for my husband. Loved it so got another when the old one was worn after a few years. Perfect in every way. He attaches his air pods on the tab so it won’t get lost.
customer_reviews.author: J. Masters

customer_reviews.title: Great cover
customer_reviews.text: I got this to replace a different one I had bought initially that rotated for portrait view. I like this better. I never need to use portrait view and that function had made my other one floppy. This one is sturdy and stays put well when propped up. I really like the glittery pink color too. It is magnetic as well which is nice.
customer_reviews.author: JMesa

customer_reviews.title: A good case
customer_reviews.text: We got this case as in an inexpensive alternative to some of the more expensive brands. This case is built really well for it’s price point. At this price point (under $20) I would give it five stars. I have taken one star off here because when compared to the fancy more expensive cases It isn’t up to the higher quality. We like it and would definitely buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: LovinLife

customer_reviews.title: I had a prior Fintie case that I loved but while using the iPad
customer_reviews.text: I had a prior Fintie case that I loved but while using the iPad, it would slip out of the grooves provided. I ordered this case in purple and it's perfect. The way it's set up now the iPad does not slip at all and you can use with ease. However that being said, this one does not rotate like the last one and if the screen is vertical there is no way to prop. Fintie products are made well and thought out. I think you'll enjoy this case if you're in the market for one. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Marilou

customer_reviews.title: Design and Quality 👌
customer_reviews.text: I love this case! It’s so pretty and is well-made. I use my iPad everyday nearly all day long and I’m pretty rough with them. So, this is my third or fourth Fintie case. I keep buying from them because of the quality. What I like the most (other than the quality and aesthetics) is that the Sleep Mode always works!! Thanks for continuing to upgrade the design and quality. I liked the strap but glad they figured out this alternative.
customer_reviews.author: Ready2Read

customer_reviews.title: Works okay but is heavy
customer_reviews.text: It fits okay, not great and it is very heavy. Should have paid closer attention. It certainly is protective, but kind of defeats the point of the iPad being so light and easy to carry.
customer_reviews.author: ashearer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend, very happy with my order
customer_reviews.text: I’m really fussy and been shopping online and the price is correct across the board. I really love it! It really looks like a composition notebook. No one would think twice it’s my iPad. (Less chance of being taken) Love the close/sleep mode, good magnetic grip and how it is protected around the edges (like a slip in sleeve) and sealed well with an internal Velcro strip. It has three well sewn in strips for good angling the iPad, no need to worry about slipping. Good quality and would buy another. The pen holder is a plus. I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: ljaxon

customer_reviews.title: Great design and fit!
customer_reviews.text: I really like the design and fit of this case. I bought it for my new iPad and it covers it nicely. I like that you insert the iPad into the case from the side and secure it with a Velcro-style tab. It's in there nice and snug and the corners are protected while ports are easily accessible. The little exterior pocket holds small items like business cards or notes. This is not a form-fitting hard case, but that's not what I wanted. I like the soft, padded material with a pebble texture and think it protects my iPad really well.
customer_reviews.author: M. Mendelson

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, fits well
customer_reviews.text: I love this! It is sturdy and well-fitting protection for my new iPad, and it props (as the pictures show) for use, adjustable several ways. I am really pleased that I got this. Note that the photo illustration shows what looks like a larger cover behind it. It is actually just a front view which they enlarged.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne W

customer_reviews.title: Love this cover!
customer_reviews.text: Love this cover! Concerned over slight hump in edge cover that looks like it wasn’t caught completely by the stitching. Not worth the trouble of returning as we are older and staying at home. Returning would require going out to mail. Going to keep it and hope it holds. Other than that, it is really pretty and well constructed. I really like the pocket on the outside of cover.
customer_reviews.author: J. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great For  the Price
customer_reviews.text: I've been through a few disappointing iPad covers so when I go this one it was a big step up. It's sturdy and has a nice grain to the finish that keeps it from slipping from your hands when the case is closed. The only con is that I don't find it stands up unless it is sitting on a perfectly flat surface, so if you want to use this on your lap, go for a different model.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa R

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and works
customer_reviews.text: Not a whole lot to say except that it works as advertised. I have an iPad Air 2 and I thought the fit was very snug-- at first I did not think it would fit. Some parts around the corner seem to be made very flimsy and seems like it could come apart easily. I think for every day use at home, this would be fine. For use on multiple trips, I am not sure how long this would last. Unlike the last ipad case I bought online, this one doesn't come with a god awful chemical smell, so that is a huge bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Tiptoeing_Tulip

customer_reviews.title: Fintie iPad  Case
customer_reviews.text: I love my new ipad case ! I knew it would be great because I had bought a fintie case for my Surface tablet and it sure is nice . It's very light and nice and thin unlike the case I was using before. The case I was using before was so heavy and thick that I didn't even want to use the ipad . But now I find myself whipping it out all the time ! I really love the automatic on and off feature when I open and close it .
customer_reviews.author: SlickRick

customer_reviews.title: High quality construction
customer_reviews.text: This is the second Finite case that I have purchased. The first one was for my Android tablet. I loved how well that one has been in terms of its construction, the quality of materials and attention to detail. So it was a no brainer for me when I purchased an IPad. Once again, this product exceeds my expectations. It is pleasing to use and it's color is vibrant. I believe that you cannot go wrong by purchasing this case.
customer_reviews.author: Maggiepirsq

customer_reviews.title: Will buy more Fintie products in the future.
customer_reviews.text: After counting the several electronic items we have in our family, I discovered we had purchased 23 Fintie Covers. Every single one of them are still in excellent condition whereas the two that weren't, need to be replaced. The fact that Fintie carries every color that we wanted was a bonus point. Five stars are well deserved.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: great style - sensible!
customer_reviews.text: exactly what i was searching for...and more than meets my expectations :D the color is perfect, the quality really seems great. what i love about this cover, after looking at other styles and reading reviews and making comparisons, is the type of edge that goes around the ipad itself. it's not one of the types into which you sort of snap the ipad. those seemed to have issues with the plastic cracking or being/becoming compromised. take a close-up look at this - you'll see what i mean. it's very similar to the type i had for my "1st gen" ipad and it simply makes sense. great price, on top of all of this!
customer_reviews.author: cathy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome deal!
customer_reviews.text: This cover can’t be beat, especially for the price. It is easy to install and use, my iPad goes into sleep mode when I close the case and wakes up when I open it, and it is of a high quality material with great workmanship. The three stops hold your tablet where you want it and the case does not obstruct any buttons or cameras. If I ever need another case, I will definitely buy another one of these. Highly recommended!!
customer_reviews.author: Monica W.

customer_reviews.title: 10/10 would recommend
customer_reviews.text: The first case I purchased (for double this cost) provided no security or protection for the iPad or pencil despite its claims to do so. A friend of mine had purchased this around the same time and loved it, so I ordered it as well and haven’t looked back. It’s cute, sturdy, sits up well for movies or reading, has magnet closure, and has a very secure-feeling loop for the Apple Pencil. I’d order it again but I think it will last a while!
customer_reviews.author: MWolfe

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, sturdy IPad case.
customer_reviews.text: This is a well made sturdy iPad cover. It fit my iPad perfectly and was very easy to install. The color rose cold is very pretty and has a very professional look to it. The tabs that hold your IPad in place when watching movies is one of the best so far as it keeps your IPad held in place so that you can watch your movie without worrying about it collapsing. I would definitely buy more product from this company. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Mona

customer_reviews.title: Withstand a sixth grader.
customer_reviews.text: A good case! Got this for my sixth grader to protect his school iPad and it’s done the job handsomely! He’s great at beating things up, but the case still looks good seven months in, the iPad is in similar condition, and the case retains all its functions. He likes the color and the ability to stand it up to watch or type. It was a great price too!
customer_reviews.author: Fantome Bizarre

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: When it arrived, the corner wasn’t sewn down properly but I decided to keep it. Then there were 2 plastic pieces that kept sliding out of place. I kept putting them back. Now there are worn spots from putting them back and the sides have cracked. I haven’t had it very long. This is too soon for these kinds of issues. I had one previously that lasted much much longer. Not happy with this purchase but it’s too late to return.
customer_reviews.author: Mickey and Allison Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Great quality to protect iPad
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit and beautiful color. I wish there was protective material around the left (or bottom) corners. The leather strips on the inside cover are great which allow different degrees of tilt. The outside loop for pencil is very functional and an added benefit. But I do find pencil gets caught at times on a coat, sleeve, blanket, etc and I am always afraid it will damage it. I think a better design would be to make a little more room on flap crease and put loop inside when case is closed. The outside pocket is a great feature!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Super sturdy, beautiful marble!
customer_reviews.text: This case is sooooo pretty. I love the marble, it’s so simple yet chic. The material feels very sturdy and it’s pretty thick which protects the tablet well. I like how it had 3 stand holders which allows you to position the screen to whatever is best for you. I definitely recommend. I would give it 6 stars if I could!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Love this iPad holder. It’s well made and sturdy. It fits all important points and openings. This is my second one from this company..the first one latest for many yers, so I expect this one wIll too. Great look and feel. Can’t say enough good things about this product. Next month I will buy one for my smaller iPad.
customer_reviews.author: amah

customer_reviews.title: It protected my iPad!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had one of these before. So when I saw it, I immediately put it in my cart! It durable and had it for about 4 years with daily use. I have dropped my iPad with it on and am happy to say, it held up. I imagined I’d be buying a new iPad but it protected it! I also like this for the ability to stand my Japan up at three different angles.
customer_reviews.author: Abby's Mom

product_meta.title: Fintie Case for iPad 9.7 2018 2017 / iPad Air 2 / iPad Air - [Corner Protection] Multi-Angle Viewing Folio Cover w/Pocket, Auto Wake/Sleep for iPad 6th / 5th Gen, iPad Air 1/2, Purple
product_meta.description:
Color:PurpleFintie, a quality product within your reach!

This case is designed for the New iPad 9.7 2018 6th Gen, iPad 9.7 2017 5th Gen, iPad Air 2, iPad Air 1 ONLY; Will not be compatible with iPad Pro 9.7 Inch 2016 Release, iPad Pro 12.9 Inch 2015 Release Tablet, the original iPad, iPad 2,3,4 or iPad mini. 

Protect your iPad with this Fintie Multi-Angle Viewing Case at all times! The Case sports a simple and classy design made from premium PU leather, and the interior is lined with soft microfiber material that protects your tablet from prints, dirt and scratches.

Built-in Stand:
Three anti-slip stripes, propping up the tablet for considerate sturdy standing view angles and typing feature.

Front Pocket:
A large front Document Pocket to store your business cards, bank cards, notes, bills or other personal belongs while on the go. 

Easy to Use:
Insert your tablet in the open pocket and secure it in place with the fastener flap. Simply open and close to activate wake/sleep modes.

Precise cutouts:
All features of the tablet are accessible even with the case on.

PLEASE NOTE: Colors shown in pictures may slightly differ from actual product due to lighting and color settings.
feature_bullets: Specifically designed for New iPad 9.7 Inch 2018 6th Gen (A1893/A1954), iPad 9.7 Inch 2017 5th Gen (A1822/A1823), iPad Air 2 (A1566/A1567), iPad Air (A1474/A1475/A1476). Not compatible with any other devices.
This case allows you to adjust the iPad to multiple angles securely. Document Card Pocket is designed for you to store your business cards, bank cards, notes or bills while on the go.
Built from premium composition leather exterior and soft microfiber interior - snug fit, durable and protective.
Built-in magnetic strip provides sleep/wake feature. Cut outs allow access to Charge Port and Speakers. Headphones Jack and Volume can be accessed while in case.
Protect your iPad from scratches, dirt and grime. Available in a variety of bright and fun colors.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars7,616 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
